file_content.text: At least your punctuality is commendable. Spared me the waiting.
So much trouble from one Republic operative. It almost strains credulity.
My lord, I promised to rid you of this nuisance. This embarrassing farce ends here.
Securing the Emperor's prisoner is your only priority. Deal with these irritants another time.
Securing the Emperor's prisoner is your only priority. Deal with this annoyance another time.
There's no time like the present, my lord. I'll accomplish both objectives.
No matter how good you think you are, it won't be enough.
Surrender, Kilran.
Jedi... always full of confidence until you burn a hole through them.
You abandon calculated tactics for irrational revenge. This won't end well.
You've lost your balance.
By all means, persist in your overconfidence.
This is all you brought to fight with? You're in a world of trouble.
You don't have the forces.
What is it Havoc Squad says? "Superior numbers can't compare to superior training."
And here I thought you were the ugliest son of a kath hound I've ever seen.
Your boss is a freak.
My lord, I'll deliver this miscreant's tongue to you personally.
You've put everything on the line to keep that man. Why? Who is he?
Who is the Jedi prisoner?
You don't even know why you're here. Fascinating.
You are true patriots. I admire that, but I prefer you die ignorant.
You are a true patriot. I admire that, but better you should die ignorant.
The Empire salutes you, Grand Moff Kilran. I leave you to reclaim your honor.
I've heard enough from you windbags. I just wish I could kill both of you.
Shut up, already. [Attack]
Glory to the Empire!
You do realize you aren't leaving here alive?
I'm a soldier! My rank earned in blood!
My honor will be satisfied!
You underestimate my resources!
Execute on my mark!
That's your best? Not good enough!
You're target practice! Nothing more!
I don't deserve this... there was so much left to conquer....
